messages.raw_data:
POST /login HTTP/1.1
Host: api.example.com
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer token123
Content-Length: 45

{"username":"admin","password":"secret123"}

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Set-Cookie: session=abc123; HttpOnly
Content-Type: application/json

{"status":"success","token":"jwt_token_here"}
